mapper.insert: insert into schedule (staff, time, content) VALUES (#{staff} ,#{time} ,#{content} )
mapper.update: update schedule set content = #{content} where staff = #{staffId}
mapper.select: select * from schedule where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) <= date(time) and staff = #{staffId}
select * from schedule where time > #{timeNow} and #{finalTime} > time and staff=#{staffId};
